title: Trilith Studios President on Launch of ATL Complex
itunes:title: Trilith Studios President on Launch of ATL Complex
description:
Frank Patterson, President and CEO of Trilith Studios, discusses rebranding and the launch of a new Atlanta entertainment complex.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
